      • loadDateOfLatestEvent

        public static java.lang.String loadDateOfLatestEvent(java.lang.String server,
                                                     java.lang.String token)
        Sends the GET request to the server to obrain the date of latest registered event on Raspberry Pi.
        Parameters:
        server - is the server address.
        token - is the authentication token.
        Returns:
        string with the server answer.

      • loadEventsFromServer

                                                         throws java.text.ParseException
        Loads events from the server.
        Parameters:
        server - is the server address
        date - is the date of the last known event for the application
        token - is the authorization token.
        Returns:
        list of RpiEventItem.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
